# IsSupported

**Property List Key**

A Boolean that indicates whether the app acts as a browser that supports authentication sessions.

## Discussion

Set the corresponding value to `YES` to indicate that your browser app can handle authentication requests that other apps generate with [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASWebAuthenticationSession]. For details, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AuthenticationServices/supporting-single-sign-on-in-a-web-browser-app].

## Capabilities

- **EphemeralBrowserSessionIsSupported**: A Boolean that indicates whether the app supports ephemeral browsing when conducting authentication sessions.
- **CallbackURLMatchingIsSupported**: A Boolean that indicates whether the app can handle callbacks to match authentication URLs.
- **AdditionalHeaderFieldsAreSupported**: A Boolean that indicates whether the app supports additional header fields in requests.
